bug.short_desc: Docmentation Patch on the SASL /doc directory

long_desc.thetext:
Created an attachment (id=1304) patch against /doc directory of sasl
This is a patch which fixes some old links, and includes miscellaneous other small updates.
It was generated against a CVS version of sasl (9/4/2010).
Created an attachment (id=1323) URL updates for 2.3.16
Created an attachment (id=1324) URL updates for 2.4.4
Sorry, both of my patches belong to http://bugzilla.cyrusimap.org/show_bug.cgi?id=3255
